The heavyweight terry fabric feels super soft on the inside, keeping you warm without being too heavy. The distressed look adds a vintage touch.  It is versatile to pair with anything, and good for both men and women.

评论概述: Comfortable Sweatshirt With a NIce Heavy Feel
评论详情: I really enjoy wearing this sweatshirt, the material is the perfect weight and thickness in all the right areas. The cuffs are a nice thick material with good elasticity too.  The material/fabric has a nice "worn in" feel to it, not super soft, but not rigid either. The color I ordered (Grey) had a nice fade to it, which is consistent throughout the sweatshirt.  I ordered a XX-Large, it does not seem to be oversized, I personally would describe it as true to size. Perhaps it is wider in some areas around the waist, but in my opinion the XX-Large seems to be true to size.  The sweatshirt did shrink a little bit after its first wash, but that is to be expected from 100% cotton clothing.  TL;DR Comfortable sweatshirt that I wear all the time, definitely recommended!

This oversized hoodie is perfect! It's just the right loose fit and has a comfortable, soft fabric that isn’t scratchy at all. The color is exactly as pictured with a nice faded acid-wash effect. I’m 5’2” and 115 lbs, and I got a small, which fits perfectly. It’s big, cozy and stylish...and lightweight enough for slightly warmer days. But also warm enough on chilly days. I get compliments on it. It has an “I’ve-had-this-forever-and-it’s-my-favorite-sweatshirt” look. If you like an oversized sweatshirt which I do…the one is great!  Highly recommend!

This hoodie is heavy just as describes and does fit oversized. The fabric isn't that very soft lightweight kind of fabric, but more like that of a beach towel but softer. The acid wash isn't very noticeable which is fine, since it wasn't pictured to be very noticeable in the store front either. The seams were nice and it hasn't shown any wear or tear from the washing machine.

This hoodie  is so adorable, and extremely comfortable. I love wearing them. The quality is great and I cannot argue with the price. All in all a great closet staple! Love the material thickness and fits true to size.
The fit is good, color is a bit off, but the fabric is so cheap and the wash looks horrible. Definitely not worth the almost $60 I paid for it.

My son LOVES this hoodie. He's not one to have outbursts of emotion, but when it arrived he put it on right away and gushed over how much he likes it. It has a great look, fits perfectly, is heavy enough to help keep him warm without feeling like a jacket. It's baggy enough that he can layer under it on cool days, not so heavy that it's smothering on warm days, and is comfortable with a heavy coat on top for the sub-freezing temperatures we just started getting. For the style, comfort, and quality, it's definitely in a good price range. Thank you for reading, I hope it was helpful.

recently picked up a couple of men's vintage oversized hoodies, and they have quickly become staples in my wardrobe!  Pros:  Comfortable Fit: The oversized design is incredibly comfortable and perfect for lounging or casual outings. It feels relaxed without being shapeless.  Stylish Aesthetic: The vintage look adds a unique flair that sets it apart from standard hoodies, making it easy to pair with jeans or joggers.  Soft Fabric: The material is soft and cozy, providing warmth without being too heavy. It’s great for layering during colder months.  Durability: The quality of the fabric is impressive, holding up well after multiple washes without losing shape or color.  Cons:  Sizing Variability: The oversized fit can vary between styles, so it’s good to check the size guide to ensure you get the right fit.  Limited Color Options: Some designs have a limited color palette, which may not appeal to everyone’s taste.  Overall, these men's vintage oversized hoodies are a fantastic addition for anyone looking to blend comfort with style. They offer a relaxed vibe that’s perfect for everyday wear. Highly recommended!

评论概述: A very nice, quality hoodie that fits well.
评论详情: This is a quality hoodie that is made from a dense fabric, but it's not too thick or heavy. I'm 6 foot 2 170 lbs and the large fits really well. I like that the elastic waistband is not too snug or tight which tends to ride up on me when I sit down. The sleeves are a nice length as well. The pocket is deep, meaning that it has an edge on each side so things won't slide or fall out of the pocket easily. I got the grey and the acid wash looks great. This is an easy five star rating.
Love the vintage look of this as well as the fit and feel. Size up for a looser fit.

When this hoodie arrived it was vacuum sealed into a flat block resembling an old vinyl record album, and it was heavy. Once it was freed from it's bag I waited for it to "explode" into shape because it's advertised as "heavyweight", and it was heavy. No explosion. It did expand, but the material is not as thick as I pictured, being 100% cotton, and "heavyweight". Thing is....this hoodie IS heavyweight, and soft, and one of the most comfortable hoodies I've ever worn ! And I wear a LOT of hoodies. The material is deceiving, because it's rather thin in your hand, but it's nice, and heavy when you hold it, and feels incredible wearing it. I have hoodies 1/2" thick that aren't as warm and cozy as this one. It has a fleece-like lining inside which may be the reason it's so thick, and warm. The beauty doesn't end there though. The "acid wash" on this hoodie is pretty awesome, and it looks like I've been wearing it for the last 10 years. I got the gray color and it has the perfect "worn hoodie" look, like that old one you just can't part with. I will never part with this one. It is over sized which means plenty of room, though it's true to size and my usual XL fit me perfectly. It has a good size "kangaroo pocket" in front that can hold quite a bit. This hoodie is outstanding, and if I could give it 10 stars, I would ! Take it from a hoodie addict.....this is great stuff !! HIGHLY recommend !!

I ordered this for my mom and she said it was a perfect fit and the thickest sweatshirt she has ever owned! It is warm, which is great because she is elderly. Price was higher than typical comparable items, but much better in quality. She loves it!
Very cute, very comfortable. I can't take this off! I love it. It fits perfectly

This hoodie is awesome. It's 100% cotton which is amazing as everything recently is made of polyester. It's very breathable and doesn't have fleece lining. Which makes is great for fall and days that aren't very cold. The fabric is soft and stretchy. The color is great, I like the acid washed look. It's very comfortable. Overall it's a great piece of clothing. It is on the pricier side, but honestly it's worth it because it's really hard to find clothes that aren't plastic these days.

this hoodie is a nice weight and thickness but should not be called oversized. I ordered up a size up just to be safe and glad I did. it fits, just---the 2xl fits like an xl. just be aware of that when ordering-otherwise it is a good value

I love this hoodie. Terry cloth is such a great material and I'm not sure why it's not more widely used. The colors mostly all work great with the acid wash. Unfortunately, the color I got (beige) winds up kind of looking stained by dirty water. It's not bad from afar, but the pooling of the acid on the seams winds up not looking the best.  Aside from that one color issue, this is great and I couldn't recommend it more.

This is my new go to sweatshirt.  Comes vacuum packed which is kind of cool.  Feels like a book. Open it up ad it fluffs right up.  This is a great mid weight sweatshirt.  I live in CA and it's perfect weight for here.  Not too thick and not too light.  Color is bright and looks nicely broken in.  I got a compliment the first time I wore it and my daughter has already tried to swipe it.  Sizing is true but oversized.  Get it!UPDATEOkay. I do still love this sweatshirt…. BUT. Wash it seperately!  This bleeds a lot of color in the wash and you can expect a load of pink clothes if you don’t be careful. It’s still bleeding after several washes so be careful.  Probably best to just always wash seperately.  Knocking off a star for this.
Soft enough and the acid wash is cool!

Thick, quality material and it's heavy without being cumbersome.
